tool.name: Scale cell coordinates

param.name: x_coord
param.label: Key for X spatial coordinate in adata.obs

param.name: y_coord
param.label: Key for Y spatial coordinate in adata.obs

param.name: resolution
param.label: Value to multiply pixel coordinates by

param.name: unit
param.label: Unit for scaled coordinates
param.help: Will be appended to new column name (Example: 'X_centroid_um')

tool.help:
This tool allows a user to scale x,y pixel coordinates to the physical distance (microns, for example)
**Inputs** - anndata h5ad file with x,y coordinates in pixels - column names for pixel coordinates in adata.obs - Physical resolution of the image (microns per pixel, for example) - Unit for the resulting physical distance ('um', for example)
**Outputs** - anndata h5ad file with new columns, with column names formatted with the existing column name and physical distance appended ('X_centroid_um', for example)
